name: Take One OR ELSE
description:
Made for the Vaultacular Game Jam

Stop kids from stealing all of the candy you left out in this short tower defense game

Controls

M- menu

To place towers, hover your mouse over the tab on the right, and then click the button you want and place it in the world.

The Bushes and Hand are powerful one time uses, so use them wisely. the Hand must be bought before someone reaches the candy, and the bushes activate automatically and scare everyone on screen
